00035 typedef muxBase baseclass;
00036 
00037 public: 
00038                 muxPrio()
00039                 {       serverState = serverIdling;     // serve idle
00040                         doParseBufSiz = FALSE;          // no common buffer size
00041                 }
00042         void    addpars();
00043         rec_typ REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00044         void    early(event *);
00045         void    late(event *);

00048         int     command(char *, tok_typ *);

00051         queue   *prioQ;                 // the queues
00052         int     *qLens;                 // each queue length is coppied -> simple export

00054
